original: 14.32. Kāmāvacaradukādi🔽Kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.🔽Rūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kāmāvacaraduka ādi  kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na kāmāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na na kāmāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava  rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na rūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Section on the Pairs Beginning with the Sense Sphere

original: Narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na na rūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava

original: Arūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a fine-material-sphere states as condition, a fine-material-sphere state arises … (three triplets) … With a non-fine-material-sphere state as condition, a non-fine-material-sphere state arises … (omitting the four that are impossible).

original: Naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Arūpāvacarañca naarūpāvacarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  arūpāvacaram ca na arūpāvacaram ca dhammam paṭicca na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a fine-material-sphere and a non-fine-material-sphere state as condition, a non-fine-material-sphere state arises … (omitting the four that are impossible).🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke dve pe avigate pañca
translated: With a cause as condition, five … With an object as condition, two … With nutriment as condition, two … With a faculty as condition, five … With a kic as condition, five … With a nutriment as condition, two … With a faculty as condition, five … With a kic as condition, five … With a preceding as condition, five … With a rebirth-linking as condition, two … With ignorance as condition there are five kinds of formations.
